#include <iostream>
#include<cmath>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    /*
        rectangle 1 bottom left (x1,y1) top right (x2,y2)
        rectangle 2 bottom left (a1,b1) top right (a2,b2)
    */
    int x1,y1,x2,y2;
    int a1,b1,a2,b2;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
    cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
    cin>>a1>>b1>>a2>>b2;
    long int area=(y2-y1)*(x2-x1)+(a2-a1)*(b2-b1);
    int width=min(x2,a2)-max(x1,a1);
    int height=min(y2,b2)-max(y1,b1);
    long int area_intersection=0;
    if(!(width<=0||height<=0))
        area_intersection=width*height;
    cout<<area-area_intersection<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
